name: Odin Flash
description:
Odin Flash

This is a flash card game created for The Odin Project's first Game Jam

Synopsis

This game takes heavy inspiration from both Number Munchers and Tetris as well as my deep fondness for traditional flash cards. The goal is to match cards to the prompt by making as few mistakes as possible.

Controls Player Up Down Left Right Select Player One Up Arrow Down Arrow Left Arrow Right Arrow Enter Player Two W S A D Space Credits
